text: 21.8: FG 6.5; 8.5; 8.26; 8.40; Ef 4.11; 2 T 4.5Nza maaŋ kegap, mba mɨtimanera maaŋ thav, khavgiap, wari vui. Nza vov, Sisaria ŋgu bakɨme phorgi. Nza Sisaria phorgav, wari vov, Firip phenan vegi. Firip, ana Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun nzuai guma mbe ma. Nza ana phorga ki. Firip vhɨra Zisas mba farasarigi 12 thɨgi ŋaara gumgir kurkurigi, harathɨgi gumgir rɨgar ki guma mbe ma.
